channel.title: Coding on Gabe Nespoli
channel.description: Recent content in Coding on Gabe Nespoli

item.title: Coding Projects
item.description: phzlab (MATLAB): entrainment (MATLAB): physiohearingaids (MATLAB): resampling (R): A tool for assessing how much data is needed for an average to become stable. extractMIR (MATLAB): A wrapper on MIR Toolbox to extract many audio features from many audio files and save the tabular data. Can append to an existing file to facilitate starting and stopping, since it will usually take a long time. toneutils (MATLAB): Generate tones and tone sequences by specifying the desired frequencies, harmonics, length, onset/offset ramps, etc.
